Replace.Text: Times have changed, and the glory of the past has been washed away by the years. The Kingdom of Rakshul gradually withdrew from the main stage of history amidst the turmoil of the millennium. Magistrate Manquequez, you are the sword of Laxul, may you accept the will of the gods, and with Grey Walker's fearlessness and bravery, lead Laxul back to the top of the pack!
Bloody flames, flames like snow [NEWLINE] Trees are like torches, covering the white moon

Each forest or rainforest plot within the city limits +1 gold coin [ICON_Gold], Productivity [ICON_Production], Faith [ICON_Faith], Technology [ICON_Science], Culture [ICON_Culture], Food [ICON_Food] [NEWLINE] Unlock drama and poetry, protection After the earth's municipalities, the bonus amount will be increased, and unlocking these municipalities will also provide 3 amenity [ICON_Amenities] for your city respectively. [NEWLINE] Unable to build Industrial District, Aeroport, Space Center, [ICON_PRODUCTION] -66% when building District [ICON_DISTRICT]

After occupying a city, get a governor title [ICON_Governor] and two envoys [ICON_Envoy]. [NEWLINE] You capture cities that keep them loyal [ICON_PressureUp] and don't lose population [ICON_Citizen] [NEWLINE] Each of your cities gives you 2 diplomatic favor [ICON_Favor] at war
Trying to subdue his threat. Likes civilizations that protect forests, and hates civilizations that destroy the environment.
I haven't seen your face clearly yet.
The elves want to live in harmony with you.
I think the time has not come.
The fairy sword will never be afraid of strong enemies, and I will also challenge.
The elves no longer allow your indulgence, take it.
My King Ananir! my sword! broken.......
It looks like the end is set.
We are not yet acquainted, and the elves cannot yet accept you.
The elves have prepared high-quality mithril treasures and glazed emeralds, can they come to the palace of Your Excellency?
I am Manke Ques, the Sword of the Fairy, Your Excellency will set foot on the land of the fairies, do you come here with good intentions?
Oh, your city is just ahead? Can we come and visit?
In the dense forest is the residence of elves, would you like to come to my king's court as a guest?
Deep in the forest is the country of elves, explorer, can you tell me, where is your hometown?
Wuhuatianbao, the unity of nature and man, your coexistence with nature should be a model.
Wake up, lost traveler, cherish everything that nature gives you.
Well, the elves value this great friendship.
You're safe, idiot, just this time!
We ask for peace, great enemy, and friend?
Welcome to the forest of elves.
You need a more devout heart.
The elves look forward to visiting your land, can you open the door?
Threats are useless, if you have evil intentions, it is better to stop here.
(The elves loathe the destroyer of nature)
Greywalk Plains and the Northam Range

Rakshul's characteristic long-range unit, unlocked after researching archery, has a longer range and anti-invisibility ability, and can gain concealment in forests and rainforests. Gain enhancements after completing certain technologies.

Lakshul's characteristic cavalry unit, unlocked after researching stirrups, stronger mobility and long-range resistance, recovers HP after defeating the enemy and gains faith equal to the target's combat power. Gain enhancements after completing certain technologies.

Lakshul's characteristic naval long-range unit, unlocked after researching the cross-sail device, has stronger mobility, longer vision and range, and can be stacked with long-range resistance when there are other elf white sails around, and gets forced life recovery every round. Gain enhancements after completing certain technologies.

Rakshul's characteristic unit, only one can exist, it is given as a gift when the capital is established, and it consumes a lot of productivity to regenerate after death. Provides a powerful aura to the elf units within 2 squares. Complete specific technologies to gain boosts.
Provides a 25% experience bonus to elf units produced in the city. +7 Housing [ICON_Housing], +2 Productivity [ICON_Production], Gold [ICON_Gold], Faith [ICON_Faith]. +3 Amenities [ICON_Amenities]
Rak'Sul unique area, which replaces the Barracks. +10 housing [ICON_Housing], +4 amenity [ICON_Amenities], 6 citizen slots [ICON_Citizen]. Provides higher benefits per citizen
Holy Whistle provides 25% experience bonus for elves
After researching specific technologies, elves are strengthened
The presence of Elfini makes the elves stronger
You can only have one Elfini
You can only have one Elfini
Provides an aura to surrounding elves
Provides an aura to surrounding elves
Gain resistance when fighting against ranged units, restore 30 health after defeating units
Gain 20 Combat Strength when fighting ranged units
Gain life regen, gain resistance against ranged attacks
Elven white sail swarms gain ranged resistance

Lakshul, also known as [Issur], comes from the Ino language: Îtheshrëu, which means "the end of the valley". Rakshul is the result of the peaceful unification of many elven cities in the northern plains of Grevok Forest. Founded in 2012 of the Old Era (3708 BC in the Aino calendar), the name comes from the oldest, noble and mysterious city [Luther] (L'xüh in Ino language), which is also the capital

Lakshul is a dual constitutional monarchy country with Lui elves (Rûœ in Ino, meaning "son of light") and dragon descendants as the main ethnic groups. The head of state is the queen, also known as [Xido] (Ino Zeëdoh, meaning "crown of the sun"), a cabinet appointed by the Queen, the Prime Minister of the cabinet is called the [Registrar], who is responsible to the Queen and the United Council, which is formed by the representatives of each city. s right

According to the elven epic «Inai Loi», the early elves were called Venõ, and they were created by Êhœ using [Star Beam]. After finishing the three lower races, almost all left. After Vino created the two elves Lui and Leñyåh, he also went back with Yiheng.

Among the two great elves, Lan Ya lives in the north of the mainland, and Lui lives in the middle of the mainland. Around the year 972 in the ancient era, all the members of the Lanya tribe disappeared, leaving only the remains of their city and the history books that stopped abruptly.

In the year 1048 of the Ancient Era, all the Luis moved to the north of Greywalk, which was more suitable for living in isolation. Many cities were established along a huge river. Although they were connected with each other, they did not form the image of a unified country. In the year 2012 of the Ancient Era, Noz (ÑozÎ në L'xüh) of Luthor predicted a war that would usher in a new era, and called on the Luis to take the initiative to gather their will to unite. Thus Laxul was born, which is also the beginning of the Old Era. the first year of

For thousands of years after the founding of Lakshul, the queen's dictatorship has been practiced. These elves are kind and peaceful by nature. They have lived in the valley in the north of the birch forest called Grewok for generations. There has never been any internal conflicts, and they rarely communicate with the outside world. And that prophesied war never came.

In 3535 of the Old Era, a large number of dragon descendants migrated northwards sounded the horn for the prophesied war. These dragon descendants who were driven to Raxhur were accepted and properly settled by the elves. Those who came with them were the Vassekens. and news of the Hildian invasion.
The war lasted for a full millennium. In the last year, both sides were determined to fight a "good fight", and on the vernal equinox of this year, a battle of unprecedented scale was launched.

In this battle known as [Grey Walker's Doom], Luke Ursu Manquequez, the leader of Lakshul's legion, gave full play to the adaptability of the elves to forests and rainforests, and destroyed all of them through countless surprise attacks. The Hildia people, who were aggressively marched by Lakshul, finally negotiated peace with Hildia without losing an inch of land, and even included the entire Greywalk into the kingdom's territory.

This decisive battle that took place in 4535 of the Old Era is considered to be a turning point for Lakshul. The new queen, Elfini, who was also the commander in the decisive battle, was crowned the highest title of the Kingdom of Manquequez and appointed her as the prime minister of the kingdom. At this point, Lakshul has entered the new era, which is the year of the new era, 1185 BC in the Aino calendar.
In the next hundred years, the prime minister gradually evolved into a cabinet, and Lakshul became a dual constitutional monarchy, forming a modern political framework.

Luke Ursu Manquequez (Old Era 4514-New Era 159), belongs to the first race of light elves, the first dictator of the Kingdom of Raxhur, because of his victory in the nine-month Battle of Greywalk He performed bravely and led Lakshul to victory. He was awarded [Baron Light Divila] by Queen Elfini, and was hailed as the "Sword of Fairy" by the Lakshul people.

Luke Ursu Manquequez was born in a family of craftsmen in Masha Town, Luther City. His father, Enzolo Manquequez, cast all kinds of exquisite Mithril products for the Luther court. After learning casting skills from his father for 5 years, 19-year-old Luke Ursher went to the border city of Guangdivala to join the Fourth Elven Cavalry Regiment, working as a clerk, responsible for city management and information collection and transmission.

In 4534, Light Divila was besieged by the Hildean army. After the defeat of the frontline resistance army, Luke Ursu led the remnants of the cavalry to launch raids on the besieged engineering corps for many times, effectively delaying the attack speed of the Hildian army. , and finally forced the Sildians to give up Light Divila. This battle won great prestige for Luke Ursho, and Queen Winone personally went to Guangdivala to award Luke Ursho [Luthor Mithril Medal]

At the beginning of 4535, the scout team led by Crown Prince Elfini, who served as a scout in the army, was ambushed by the Sildian army. Only Elfini survived and brought the information of the Sildian attack to Luke Ursho .

When Luke Erxiu was just about to get on his horse and go to Luther to mobilize volunteer troops, he got the news that Luther City had fallen and the royal family had fled north to Diglowers. In an absolutely isolated situation, Luke Ursho led Elfini's scout legion to take the initiative to launch several surprise attacks on Sildia. However, it turned out that this was a very good and wise step. Due to the sharp decrease in the number of people capable of fighting and the encumbrance of wounded soldiers, the Hildia army was still unable to maintain a large scale before reaching Guangdivala.

When the news that Guangdivella had always stood in the center of the battlefield reached the royal family, the queen immediately gave Luke Ursu the highest military power and declared Guangdivella to be the temporary capital during the war. Since then, in the six months since then, relying on the continuous support from the north and the dense forest terrain around Guangdivella, Luke Ursu has achieved the miracle of one against ten many times. After that, Luke Ursho chose to take the initiative to attack. After exhausting Hildia's army, he went straight to the forts occupied by Hildia around Greywalk, regained a lot of lost ground, and sent Yegrawok A blockade line was established on the outskirts of the forest, encircling the Hildia army on the Greywalk Plain

As winter was approaching, the desperate Hildians realized the inevitable outcome of this battle, and chose to make peace with Luke, in exchange for peace on the terms of ceding all the cities in the Grewok region. After seeking the opinion of the royal family, Luke Ursu accepted the conditions and mercifully released tens of thousands of Hildia prisoners held in Guangdiweila and the surrounding fortresses.

In the 4th year of the New Era, Elfini took over the throne. In view of her performance during the war, she appointed Luke Erxiu as the first prime minister of the New Era of Lakshul to coordinate affairs outside the court. Luke Ursho established the cabinet and dictator system four years later, and created the Central Council, thus establishing the embryonic form of the modern Raxhur Kingdom. In the year 64 of the New Era, after three terms in office for 60 years, Luke Ursu announced his departure from the center of power. Since then, he has devoted himself to adventures, including the southernmost corner of the Kingdom of Sildia and the cape of the Airlie subcontinent.

In the 130th year of the new era, after bidding farewell to the people of the whole country, Luke Erxiu led a group of attendants to set out to sea to explore the legendary location of the Red God——Tianzhou. Since then, there has been no news of Luke Ursu. It was not until the new century 160 that the ship he boarded when he set off appeared again at the port of Diglowers, and his former attendants on board took Luke Ursu Luke Xiu's adventure notes, books and his will were brought back to Raxul, and people learned that Luke Erxiu died after living in the Red God Kingdom for 29 years.
